content:
The aliens are spawning at the top of the screen and moving towards the bases. My avatar is currently at (10, 16). There are bases at the top and bottom. There are aliens (@) at (0,0) and (0,1). I should move left to target the aliens, and protect the bases.
Action: 2

Action:2
I will move the avatar to the left, hoping to intercept the aliens spawning from the left side of the map.

Okay, I see two aliens on the top row, and bases scattered throughout. My avatar is at row 10, col 14. My goal is to protect the bases. Since the aliens are to the left, I will move to the left and shoot.
Action: 2
I will move to the left to get closer to the aliens.

The closest alien is to the left. I need to shoot it down.
Action:2
``` Feedback: Move left to be closer to the alien.```

The aliens are approaching from the left. I should move to the left to intercept them and protect the bases.
Action: 2
I expect to move my avatar to the left, closer to the approaching aliens.

Action:3
I will move right to be in position to target the aliens. I expect the avatar to move one position to the right.

The avatar is currently at (10, 12). There are alienBlue sprites at the top of the map. Let's move right to try and target them and protect the base.
Action: 3
I'm moving right to position myself to shoot the aliens above and protect the bases.

The avatar is currently at (10, 13). There are no immediate threats nearby. The closest aliens are at (0, 0), (0, 1), (0, 4), (0, 5), (0, 8), and (0, 9). I will move right to be closer to the bases and portals on the right side of the screen.
Action: 3
I expect the avatar to move to the right, getting closer to the right side of the map and the bases/portals located there.

Okay, I see many aliens ('@') at the top of the screen. My avatar ('a') is located at row 10, col 14. There are bases ('#') at row 1, 2, 7, 8 and 9. The closest aliens above my avatar are at row 0. I need to shoot them down to protect the bases.

Action: 1
I will use the action to shoot the alien. I expect to shoot the closest alien and increase my score.

Okay, I see the layout. Bases are primarily at rows 1, 2, 7, 8, 9 and columns 0-2, 3-8, 12-18, 23-27. There are aliens spawning at the top of the screen. My avatar is at (10, 14).

The strategy mentions prioritizing base defense and managing portal threats. Since aliens are at row 0, I will move right and shoot.
Action: 3
I expect the avatar to move to the right.

Okay, I see bombs at row 6, col 9 and col 10. My avatar is at row 10, col 15. I need to move to the left to intercept those bombs to protect the bases.
Action:2
I expect the avatar to move to the left.

Okay, I see the layout. There are bases at row 1,2,7,8,9. Bombs are falling at row 6 and row 7 on column 9,10. The avatar is located at (10,14).
I need to shoot the bombs to protect the bases.
```Action:1```
I will use the sam to shoot the bombs, I expect the bombs to be destroyed.

The bases are on rows 1,2,7,8,9. I see bombs at (7,9), (7,10). My avatar is at (10,14). I need to shoot the bombs down to protect the bases.
Action:1
``` Action:1 ```
I will use the action to shoot at the bomb, hopefully destroying it and protecting the base.

The bombs are approaching the bases, and there are also aliens at the top row.
Since the avatar is at (10, 14), and the sam is at (9, 14). I should use the sam to kill bombs.
Action: 1
I expect to shoot a bomb that is getting close to the base.

The bases at (8,13), (8,14), (8,15), (8,16) are in danger. There are bombs at (8,9) and (8,10) coming, and the avatar is at (10,14). I will shoot the sam at the bomb to protect the bases.
Action: 1

The aliens are spawning at the top of the screen and I need to shoot them down. The avatar is at position (10, 14). There are aliens to the left and right. I will move left.
Action:2
I will move left to intercept the aliens on the left side.

Okay, I see. The avatar is at (10, 13). There are aliens at the top of the screen. I need to move to a good position to shoot them and defend my bases. Let's move left first.

Action:2
``` Feedback: I'm moving the avatar to the left to get a better shooting angle on the aliens and defend the base. I expect the avatar to move one position to the left. ```

The avatar is at row 10, col 12. There are aliens at row 0. The bases are located at row 1,2, 7,8,9. To protect the bases, I should move to the left to shoot the aliens.
Action: 2
I will move left to intercept the aliens.

Okay, I see a lot of aliens at the top of the screen. My avatar ('a') is at (10, 11). There are bases ('#') spread across rows 1, 2, 7, 8 and 9. The aliens at the top are a clear and present danger to the bases on row=1 and row=2. I need to move to the left to intercept the aliens.

Action: 2
``` Feedback: I'm moving to the left to try and intercept the incoming aliens and protect the bases.```

The avatar 'a' is currently at (10, 10). There are many aliens '@' at the top. The bases '#' are at rows 1, 2, 7, 8, 9. I need to shoot the aliens to protect the bases. I will move left to prepare shooting the aliens on the left.
Action: 2

The avatar 'a' is located at (10, 9). There are many alienBlue '@' at row 0, 1, 2. Bases are in row 1, 2, 7, 8, 9. I should move left to target the aliens and protect the bases.
Action:2
I expect the avatar to move to the left, getting into a better position to defend the bases from the incoming aliens.```

Okay, I see a lot of aliens at the top of the screen. The bases are located on rows 1,2,7,8,9. The avatar is at row 10, col 8. I should move to the right to defend the right most base.
Action:3

Action:2
I will move left to be closer to the bases and aliens on the left side. I expect the avatar to move one position to the left.

Okay, I see the layout. The bases are mostly on rows 1, 2, 7, 8 and 9. My avatar 'a' is located at row 10, col 8. There are aliens at the top rows.
I need to move and shoot to protect the bases. Since the aliens are mostly on the left, I will move left and then shoot.
``` Action:2 ```
I expect the avatar to move to the left.

Okay, I see the layout. My avatar 'a' is at row 10, col 7. There are bases '#' above me and to my left and right. There are a lot of aliens '@' at the top of the screen, and some on the right side. I need to shoot them down. I will start by moving to the right to get a better shooting angle on the aliens on the right side.

Action:3
I will move right to target the aliens more effectively.

The avatar 'a' is at (10,8). There are aliens '@' at the top of the screen. My bases are at row indices 1, 2, 7, 8, 9. The objective is to shoot aliens. I will move left to get a better position to shoot.
Action:2

Okay, I see the layout of the bases and the incoming aliens. My avatar is currently at (10, 7). There are aliens in row 0, 1, 2 that are threatening my bases. Since the avatar's position hasn't changed from the last time, I'll try shooting to intercept the aliens.
Action: 1
I'll use the 'use' action to shoot a sam projectile and hopefully eliminate some of the aliens approaching the base.

The avatar 'a' is currently at (10, 7). There are aliens '@' at row 0, 1, 2. My bases are at row 1, 2, 7, 8, 9. The aliens at row 0 are the closest to my base, so I will move to the left to get closer to them.
Action: 2
I'm moving left to target the aliens spawning at the top of the screen and get closer to the bases on the left side for defense. I expect the avatar to move one step to the left.

Okay, I need to protect the bases at row 1-2 and 7-9. There are aliens spawning on row 0-2. My avatar is at (10,6). I should move right to target the aliens more effectively.
Action:3

Okay, I see a lot of aliens spawning at the top of the screen. I also see bases in rows 1, 2, 7, 8, and 9. My avatar 'a' is at row 10, column 7. There are aliens above me, so I will shoot to try to take them out before they get closer to the base.
Action: 1
``` Feedback: I will use my sam to destroy the aliens above me.```

Okay, I see a lot of aliens at the top of the screen and bases in rows 1, 2, 7, 8, 9. My avatar is at (10, 7). I should move to the right to intercept aliens coming from the right side of the map and protect bases on the right side.

Action:2
Move left to better position for shooting at the aliens.

The bases are on the left, middle, and right of the screen. There are many aliens at the top of the screen. The avatar is in the middle of the screen. I should move to the left and shoot aliens.
Action: 2

The avatar is at (10,6). There are bases above the avatar. There are aliens at row 0,1,2. I will move to the left to protect the bases on the left.
Action:2

The bases are at the top and bottom of the map. The aliens are mostly spawning at the top of the map. I should move to the left to protect the base.

Okay, I see a few alienBlue ('@') and bombs ('%') getting close to bases ('#'). My avatar ('a') is at (10, 4). There are many aliens at the top of the screen. Since I don't know which direction I'm facing, I will move to the right and then use my weapon to try and destroy some of the aliens at the top.

Action: 3

Okay, I see a lot of aliens at the top, and some bombs coming down. My avatar is at (10, 5). There is a bomb at (9, 20) and another one at (10, 20), pretty close. I need to move right and shoot to destroy it.

Action:3
I will move to the right to intercept the bombs.
